remarks: Lemma for ~ ercpbl .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ercpbl.r $e |- ( ph -> .~ Er V ) $.
ercpbl.v $e |- ( ph -> V e. _V ) $.
ercpbl.f $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> [ x ] .~ ) $.
ercpbllem.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ercpbllem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F ` A ) = ( F ` B ) <-> A .~ B ) ) $.
$d .~ x $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
